title: Scotland's independence vote doesn't change how amazing Scotland is
headline: 11 Reasons To Still Love Scotland - No Matter Who Owns It
description: You’re standing on the first tee at the Old Course at St. Andrews, hallowed home of the ancient game. Like sex and the Grand Canyon, it’s one of those rare experiences that lives up to the hype. That's just one reason to love Scotland, independent or not.
